Workers here in Fukushima

3

from the failed

4

5

6
00:00:17,620 --> 00:00:19,660
The pink ribbons on

7

8

9
00:00:26,500 --> 00:00:29,290
But the slow progress of
the cleanup in many areas

10
00:00:29,290 --> 00:00:31,780

80,000 refugees

11
00:00:31,780 --> 00:00:34,740
in limbo still
hoping to return home

12

and increasingly questioning
the central government's

13
00:00:37,600 --> 00:00:42,370
commitment directly in the
path of the 2011 tsunami.

14
00:00:42,370 --> 00:00:45,610
And just a few miles from

15
00:00:45,610 --> 00:00:48,220

this September

16
00:00:48,220 --> 00:00:50,440
the government
postpone the completion

17

here indefinitely.

18

It's now considered safe

To them it remains their food
